name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Beijing, a netizen named "PZ气静心平" has been posting posts for several days, saying that her husband worked for Xiaomi Auto. As Xiaomi has been laying off employees, her husband even had to take over the work of seven or eight people and was responsible for more than 100 stores at the same time. There were hundreds of work groups on his mobile phone. He worked overtime until the early morning every day before going home. Eventually, her husband was exhausted to death at the age of 34. Afterwards, these work groups kicked her husband out of the group. Xiaomi has not yet responded to this matter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 4, blogger Liu Daopu posted a video saying that the United Nations recently passed the "Future Compact" document, but Russia requested that a clause "not to interfere in the internal affairs of other countries under any circumstances" be added to the document. The blogger believes that Russia's intention is "I will not interfere in your internal affairs, and you don't care what I do in Russia, even if it is something bad, you outsiders cannot interfere." The blogger said, "If you are civilized and you respect human rights, then what are you afraid of?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 6, Jinan. Following the street bombing in front of the Zhangqiu District Government last month, a large number of local "spirited young men" gathered in Kuanhouli to bomb the streets. Some people jumped onto the bus stop to dance, and some people set off fireworks in the crowd.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @PoplarDesert 👍

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As of October 5, the Chinese government has organized two batches of 215 Chinese citizens to be safely evacuated from Lebanon by ship and charter flight, including three Hong Kong residents and one Taiwan compatriot. Among them, Ms. Lin, a Hong Kong resident, sent a letter of thanks to the Central People's Government, the Chinese Embassy in Lebanon, the Hong Kong Immigration Department, the Hong Kong Office in Beijing, Air China, and CCTV. In the letter, she said: Thank you to the Central People's Government for caring for overseas compatriots. At the time when the war was raging in Lebanon, it overcame all difficulties, opened up various channels, and took us home.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At noon on October 6, in Ge Village, Qinyang City, Jiaozuo City, Henan Province, a vehicle crashed into a roadside restaurant, injuring many people. It was reported online that the cause of the accident was the driver's drunk driving. A total of 9 people were injured, and there is no police report yet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 5, Shanghai. An old stock investor with the online name "Shanghai Uncle" said that after the National Day holiday, the Chinese stock market will continue to rise to near the daily limit, and the Shanghai Composite Index will reach 3489 points by the end of the month. He also said that it is a great buy and a glorious trade now, and the ChiNext and Science and Technology Innovation Board will soar next year, and he will take CITIC Securities on the most luxurious cruise ship in the motherland.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 1, during the flag-raising ceremony at Tiananmen Square in Beijing, a Russian girl with a standard Henan accent, "Henan Little Nerlisa", burst into tears due to excitement. The girl, who has been in China for 17 years, said that she felt a sense of belonging at this moment, as if she was Chinese in her previous life.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Coincidentally, on September 30, New Jersey federal prosecutor Salinger and federal multi-agency law enforcement officers jointly announced that a local Chinese young man was formally sentenced to 64 months in prison for providing material support to Hamas.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Jinan also has its own Florida. On October 5 and 6, in Jinan, Shandong, the will-o'-the-wisp teenagers gathered at Jiefang Pavilion, racing cars, setting off fireworks, and clashing with the police and security guards who were maintaining order, attracting a large number of citizens to watch.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/0nDlGiz7Jh

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At the beginning of the school year, a large number of newly enrolled college students encountered part-time training scams. The institutions took advantage of the new students' desire to earn a living and recommended students to purchase PS and editing courses ranging in price from 2,000 to 6,000 yuan, tricking students into signing contracts, and then asking students to turn on automatic payment, with money regularly deducted from bank cards, Alipay or WeChat. Students who participate in the training can take orders after passing the assessment. The institutions claim that they can quickly get their money back, and the more they work, the more they earn. However, few students can pass the assessment, and after passing the assessment, there are few part-time opportunities, and they cannot get their money back even if they continue to work part-time. To avoid disputes, these companies register in large numbers every year and then suddenly cancel their registrations.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A netizen submitted an article saying that he was recently defrauded of up to 5,000 yuan in part-time training fees. This was not the first time. The last time he was defrauded, he told his parents and was scolded badly.

content:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, "Dongdong Anan" is no longer visible on Douyin and Xiaohongshu.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Breaking news! In the early morning of October 7, a convoy of Chinese investors and engineers was hit by an explosion while traveling near Karachi International Airport in Pakistan.
The Balochistan Liberation Army issued a statement and released a photo of the attacker, claiming responsibility for the attack.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, the suicide attack at Karachi Airport in Pakistan has killed at least 2 people and injured 10. Some media reported that the dead were two Chinese engineers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In order to protect the image of their idol, fans forged a post on People's Daily Online. Recently, actor Xin Yuxi revealed that Qin Xiaoxian of Deyun Club had cheated on her many times. The incident has been on the hot search list many times and gradually fermented. On October 3, Qin Xiaoxian's fans forged the People's Daily Online website and posted an article titled "Vulgar hype to attract attention, the culture of exposing "melons" is not desirable" on the forged website. Some netizens mistakenly interpreted it as "People's Daily accuses Xin Yuxi of vulgar revelations" and "secretly supports Qin Xiaoxian". However, People's Daily Online commented that People's Daily did not publish this article, which was a complete "copycat" trick. Tongzhou police issued a notice saying that they have filed a case for investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 6, netizens submitted an article. The Bayi Campus of Zhengzhou Middle School in Zhengzhou High-tech Zone, Henan Province, adopts military management. Students are required to get up at 6 a.m. and finish evening self-study at 9 p.m. upon enrollment. The dormitory environment is very bad. The evening self-study for grade 9 is delayed to 9:30 p.m., and the free time in the afternoon is cancelled. The school also illegally divides and splits classes into experimental classes. One of the split classes is the director of moral education and the head teacher. Because the head teacher did not want to be the head teacher, he took advantage of his position to disband the class regardless of the feelings of more than 40 students. Parents and students questioned him, but he avoided the important issues and did not give a direct answer, and he also interviewed the students. Students from the disbanded class were extremely uncomfortable in the new class and suffered discrimination. One student who cut his wrists was diagnosed with depression. The new head teacher also had low morals, discriminated against the transferred students, made personal attacks, and said that those students were robbing oxygen from his original students. Before National Day, the school leaders also discussed a decision to deduct students' statutory holidays, and only Sundays...
fullContent: 10月6日，网友投稿。河南郑州高新区郑州中学八一校区采取军事化管理，刚入学就要求早上六点起床，晚上九点下晚自习，宿舍环境很恶劣，九年级晚自习延迟到了九点半，并且取消下午的自由活动时间。学校还违法分班拆班划分实验班，拆开的班级里有一个是德育主任兼班主任。该班主任因为自己不想做班主任，就借职务之便不顾四十多个同学感受解散班级。家长学生质问他，他避重就轻也不正面回答还要约谈学生。被解散班级的学生去了新班级后极不适应，饱受歧视，还有一个割腕的被确诊抑郁了，新班主任师德也很低，歧视转过来的学生，搞人身攻击，还说那些学生活着和他原来的学生抢氧气。国庆前校领导还商讨了一个决定，克扣学生的法定节假日，星期天只放一天，周日下午两点半就要返校。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 6, netizens discovered that Taobao's review had listed the Blue Sky, White Sun and Red Earth flag as an illegal image, and words such as "all over the ground red" and "the other side" were sensitive words. They could be sent out but the other party would not be able to see them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 2, the Financial Times published an article titled "China's Challenge Has Not United Americans". The current relationship between China and the United States is too complicated for the two sides to draw a clear line. It is impossible for the United States to engage in a "cold war" with its main supplier of imported goods and the second largest holder of public debt.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 7, Caixin.com published an article exposing the inside story of martial arts schools abusing students. In order to help their children "quit Internet addiction" and "get rid of rebelliousness", many parents send their children to martial arts schools with military management and "can practice martial arts and learn culture". But in fact, martial arts schools neither teach culture nor martial arts, and they constantly punish students physically and order them to do various chores. There are endless incidents of violence between coaches and students, and many students have suffered from mental disorders as a result. Many students have been injured or even died during training. In addition, the quality of martial arts school education is low, and the success rate of students is very low. Only 7% of martial arts school graduates are admitted to universities, 1% become martial arts actors, and 2% become police officers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Foreign media reported that hackers associated with the Chinese government have hacked into the networks of several US broadband providers, including major US broadband providers such as Verizon, AT&T and Lumen. Hackers were able to have access to US network infrastructure for months or even longer, and obtained sensitive data from the US government's monitoring system. The Chinese Foreign Ministry responded that it was not aware of the attack, but the United States had "fabricated" stories in the past to "blame" China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 7, Chongqing. A man said he came to Chongqing from Guizhou to find a job. He has not eaten for two days and his tendons were cut. People around him bought him some food and water.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 6, CCTV reported that Hamas leader Sinwar is still alive and can only communicate with pen and paper and no longer makes phone calls. Many netizens congratulated Sinwar on his escape from death. Netizens replied, "Protect yourself, the suffering will eventually pass" and "As long as he is not dead, it is a good thing."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 6 (Published) The blogger interviewed an old Chinese immigrant. The old immigrant said that after staying in the United States for a long time, she found that the United States is not a democracy at all. If she had another choice, she would definitely not immigrate. In addition, American children are very individualistic. Secondly, people here are very selfish, especially immigrants. She believes that people do not need to have so much autonomy when they are young. Chinese Confucianism and family concepts do not exist in the United States.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Today marks the first anniversary of the Hamas attack on Israel, and the walls of Jerusalem projected photos of 101 relatives who were held hostage for more than 365 days.
On October 7 last year, thousands of rockets were fired from the Gaza Strip into Israel. At the same time, thousands of Hamas militants infiltrated into Israel. In the chaos, Hamas and its allies killed 1,200 people in Israel and took 251 people hostage, making it the third deadliest attack in global history.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 6, Yueyang, Hunan. A man posted a video saying that in April this year, his father was diagnosed with mid-stage gastric cancer, so he brought all his savings of 50,000 yuan to Hunan Cancer Hospital for his father's treatment. The man said that at first they planned to give up surgery and go home for conservative treatment if the 50,000 yuan could not cure the disease. In May, the account balance was in arrears, but the hospital said not to ask about the subsequent expenses, which eventually resulted in a debt of more than 300,000 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 6, Yantai, Shandong. A couple said, "This bull market is certain." They decided to take out the 500,000 yuan they had used to pay off their loans and invest it all in the stock market. During the holiday, they scraped together another 500,000 yuan and planned to buy a new car on the 8th after making some money.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 6 (Released) Malaysian singer Namewee showed the flag of the Republic of China to everyone on the streets of Kuala Lumpur and asked if they knew the flag. He met a member of the Chinese Communist Party and hurriedly said "I don't know".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 7, the Chinese Embassy in Pakistan issued a statement confirming that the convoy of the Chinese-funded Port Qasim Power Generation Company Ltd. was hit by a suicide bombing at Karachi International Airport, killing two Chinese people, injuring one Chinese person, and causing several Pakistani casualties.
The Chinese embassy and consulate in Pakistan strongly condemned this terrorist act.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Currently, the sentence "The taxes your parents pay from their work are supporting the country" can be reported on Xiaohongshu

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Before the National Day, the first-year students of Hebei Zhengding Experimental Middle School wrote a big-character poster to protest the school's three-day National Day holiday.
The poster said, "We are not cattle or horses, we are human beings, and we want freedom. They (the school) rely on their connections in the county and the city to oppress us endlessly, and we must unite!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 7, the fiancée of Chinese swimmer Qin Haiyang published a long article, saying that Qin Haiyang had cheated on her during her pregnancy, had flirted with fans and synchronized swimming team members on dating apps, and had also visited prostitutes and filmed indecent videos while in the military. On the same day, Qin Haiyang's studio responded: We are collecting evidence against malicious acts of smearing the image of national athletes, distorting facts, and deliberately spreading false statements about athletes, and will report to the police if necessary.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 6, a netizen from Hebei shared a high school schedule. The chart shows that the students' day was packed with activities, including getting up at 5:25 in the morning, studying from 21:40 to 22:00, and not being able to turn off the lights until 22:30. The netizen also said that students were not allowed to go to the bathroom after the lights were turned off, were not allowed to drink water or go to the bathroom during class, boys and girls could not walk side by side, and there were strict restrictions on the hairstyles of boys and girls.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Chinese student stabbed Chinese lawyer. On October 2, the Queens High Court in New York sentenced the defendant Zhang Xiaoning to a total sentence of 25 years to life imprisonment. After hearing the verdict, Zhang Xiaoning cried in court. Two years ago, Zhang Xiaoning, a Chinese student studying in the United States, applied for political asylum and went to the United Nations headquarters to hold up a sign in order to successfully immigrate to the United States. On March 11, 2022, she stabbed lawyer Li Jinjin to death with a knife after an argument with him in the law firm.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Peixian Middle School in Luoding City, Guangdong Province.
Because they were dissatisfied with the school's increasingly stringent and bizarre management regulations, 16 first-year high school students collectively wrote a letter of opinion hoping that the school would improve the problem. As a result, all 16 students were punished. After that, a student posted the incident on Douyin, and was found by the school through the Internet police and ordered to write a letter of apology.
On October 7, Peixian Middle School issued a solemn statement and made public the students' letter of apology.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 7, it was reported online that a man stabbed someone with a knife near Shijiazhuang Passenger Transport Station. It was suspected that the taxi driver and the online car-hailing driver had a dispute over a ride. (The picture has been blurred)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 4, Guangxi. A woman posted on Weibo that her daughter was secretly photographed under her skirt and on her face on the subway last May. The photographer also uploaded the video to an illegal website, where it has been viewed over 800,000 times. After seeing the video, her daughter's colleague teamed up with several male colleagues to harass her daughter, causing her to commit suicide because she was already suffering from depression. The secretly filmed video is still online.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a Japanese person opened an account on Xiaohongshu to communicate with Chinese netizens in a friendly manner, but he encountered thousands of comments asking him to express his views on the war of aggression against China, nuclear wastewater discharge and Yasukuni Shrine.
After the Japanese person expressed his views, netizens still accused him of not being sincere enough. At the same time, some netizens who spoke for him were also criticized

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the incident of "Dongdong Anan" showing off his wealth online was exposed, some netizens dug out that many of the pictures showing off his wealth in "Dongdong Anan"'s previous account were stolen from others.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Today is Putin's 72nd birthday. It is said on the Internet that someone urinated in front of the grave of Putin's parents. Earlier, the media reported that a woman in St. Petersburg was prosecuted for leaving a note on the grave of Putin's parents.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 6, a blogger posted a video in response to Jin Canrong's comment that Taiwan is China's moral and IQ low point. The blogger said that TSMC controls 60% of the global semiconductor chip market, and there are 156 universities in a country with a population of 23 million, with an enrollment rate of 97%. Farmers also have pensions, and Taiwan's fiscal surplus is distributed to the people in red envelopes per head every year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 6, on the Yangjiang Expressway section in Guangdong, an ambulance was taking a seriously ill baby to Guangzhou. It encountered a white car occupying the emergency lane for a long time without giving way. The family said that the baby in the car was 10 months old and had undergone laparotomy for intestinal necrosis. On the way to Guangzhou for emergency treatment, the ambulance honked repeatedly, but the white car refused to give way.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 6, a woman posted on Xiaohongshu that the Want Want snow cakes she bought in Germany said on the packaging that they were made in Taiwan, not Taiwan, China. Even the NYX lip oil bottle she bought in the store had the words "made in Taiwan" printed on it. She said that Taiwanese independence is too harmful, and when will the motherland be unified? Netizens replied, "Don't go abroad if you have sensitive skin."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 6, a Chinese mercenary wrote that he came to Russia to fight fascism. Although he did not regret it, he felt very wronged. Many of his brothers were sent to the front and never came back. They fought bravely on the front line, but they did not get food and water. They walked 13 kilometers with their injured comrades, but they were treated as deserters and sent back to the front line without any injury compensation.
